title: "'Self-driving' lab speeds up research, synthesis of energy materials"
excerpt: "Researchers from North Carolina State University and the University at Buffalo have developed and demonstrated a \"self-driving lab\" that uses artificial intelligence (AI) and fluidic systems to advance our understanding of metal halide perovskite (MHP) nanocrystals."
